person.persName: Wiley Adams (Magoffin County, Kentucky, magistrate and soldier)

body.p: Magoffin County, Kentucky, magistrate and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Daniel Adams and Jane Adams. Married to Melissa Bailey Adams in Magoffin County, Kentucky, on August 15, 1861. Father of Franklin Adams, Harrison Adams, Maude J. Adams, Newton P. Adams, Lucinda Adams, and Jane Adams. Resident of Floyd County, Kentucky, in 1850. Magistrate in Magoffin County in 1860. Charged with adultery in the Floyd Circuit Court in January 1861. Remitted by Governor Beriah Magoffin on January 26, 1861. Served in the 14th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry (U.S.A.) as a private from December 10, 1861, to January 31, 1865.
